About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am an enthusiastic frontend, backend or full stack developer with a strong passion for designing and developing. I am very interested in creativity and problem solving to develop user-friendly application. I am able to work independently as well as working in a team. More so, I desire to learn, contribute and adapt to other technologies where applicable. Also as a self-taught developer my main goal-oriented fundamentals are to work in an environment with great work ethic that strives for continuous learning where there's self-improvement.
